Translations.Text: yakhana akasa khandabikhanda habe
ara tara prabhura prati utkarna habe ebam kartabyarata habe
ara yakhana prthibike samatala kara habe
ara tara bhetare ya-kichu rayeche ta niksepa karabe ebam sun'yagarbha habe
phale tara prabhura prati utkarna habe ebam kartabyarata habe.
Ohe manaba! Niscaya tomara prabhura taraphe tomake pracesta calate habe bisesa udyame, tahale tumi tamra saksat pabe.
Sutaram tara ksetre yake tara nibandhagrantha tara dana hate de'oya habe
take to tabe hiseba cukiye de'oya habe sahaja hisebanikese
ara se tara sbajanadera kache phire yabe khusi haye.
Ara tara ksetre yake tara nibandhagrantha tara pithera pascat dike de'oya habe
se takhana'i dhbansera jan'ya artanada karabe
ara jbalanta agune prabesa karabe.
Nihsandeha se tara sbajanadera madhye phurtite chila.
Nihsandeha se bhebechila ye se kakhano phire asabe na.
Na, nihsandeha tara prabhu barabara tara prati drstidata.
Kinta na, ami saksi karachi suryastera raktimabha
ara ratrike o ya-kichu ta tariye neya
ara candrake yakhana se purnangata paya
yena tomara eka stara theke an'ya stare arohana karate paro.
Sutaram tadera ki hayeche ye tara imana anache na
ara yakhana tadera nikata kura'ana patha kara haya takhana tara sijada kare na
parantu yara abisbasa kare tara mithyaropa kare
athaca allah bhalo janena ya tara lukocche.
Ata'eba tadera susambada da'o marmantuda sastira
tara byatita yara imana eneche o satkaja karache, -- tadera jan'ya rayeche eka nirabacchinna pratidana.
